name: giò bench - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Giò bench, part of the Giò series designed by Giuseppe Casarosa in 2017 to enrich the Ceccotti Collezioni living room collection. This elegant and practical bench features a plywood frame and North American walnut base with a comfortable padded seat, adding a touch of lightness to the design. It includes a lift-top in North American walnut revealing two practical storage compartments. Completed with ebony handles and brass legs, it highlights Ceccotti Collezioni's commitment to meticulous craftsmanship. The bench can be paired with other products from the same series, such as the Giò sofa or Giò sofa bed, or used on its own to showcase its unique style.
